snippet: Chris Pavone, a novelist and former nonfiction editor, contends that the sedate book publishing industry can make an exciting setting for a fictional thriller.
abstract: Novelist and former nonfiction editor Chris Pavone chooses the sedate book publishing industry as the setting for his latest fictional thriller The Accident; novel follows a New York literary agent who is slipped a manuscript with damning revelations about a real-life media mogul.
lead_paragraph: Chris Pavone, a novelist and former nonfiction editor, contends that the sedate book publishing industry can make an exciting setting for a fictional thriller.
